response.original_title: Lene Lovich: Live From New York At Studio 54
response.overview: The iconic Lene Lovich defined a sound and style that is cleraly her own. Starting in 1979 with the hit single "Lucky Number", Lene helped usher in and define the "new wave" era. Lene's melding of funk, punk, new wave, cabaret and her infectous lyrics are captured on this DVD recorded live in New York in 1981. This is Lene Lovich at her best, featuring some of her biggest hits "Lucky Number", "New Toy" and more.  1 	Details  2 	Joan  3 	Rocky Road  4 	Too Tender (To Touch)  5 	Say When  6 	Lucky Number  7 	New Toy  8 	Bird Song  9 	Angels  10 	Home  11 	One In A Million  Bonus 	Rehearsal Interview
response.title: Lene Lovich: Live From New York At Studio 54
